column1: low full toss on off stump, mistimes his drive to cover
good length outside off, no real spin, just inward drift in the air. Cut off the back foot towards cover point
driven! Excellent short to get off the mark. Full stride forward and driven between cover and cover point. Races away
good length outside off, cuts off the back foot to cover point. Too close to his body for that shot
full and wide this time, caresses this drive between cover and point. Baz the man giving the chase, but his age has caught up. The delivery wins the race to the cover-point boundary
full and wide outside off, that's three for the over! Driven once again, and beats the four infielders on the off side. This time it goes past cover's left
good length on middle, goes deep onto the back foot and turns it off his hips to midwicket
good length on off stump, angles into the batsman and traps him on his crease. Manages to inside edge his defense towards the leg side
good length just outside off, mistimes his back-foot punch to mid on for hurried run
goes short on off stump, and this time he bowls it from near the crease. Denly shuffles towards off and flicks to midwicket
back of the hander slower ball, but it's not well executed. Full toss on off stump, but deceived enough to mistime his drive. Bunted to cover
another back of the hand, full on off stump. Drives to mid on, but not timed well. Enough to take the single though
out first ball! Flighted full on off stump and turns away. Entices Denly to drive, and it's hit uppishly. Baz at short cover. Takes a small jump and collects this from above his head. Big wicket
good length on off stump, can't time his back-foot punch well. Off the bat's top half, and the pull has been dropped by Afridi. Oh dear. He blames the lights. Gives Babar a life
good length on middle, turned towards the leg side
good length on off stump, Simmons comes down the wicket but checks his shot. Looks to defend and comes off the bat-pad

full on off stump, times his drive well, but straight to mid off. Babar wants the run, but Simmons is quick to send him back. The throw's good, and Yasir takes the bails off, but looks like he broke it with his hand. Babar would've probably been safe anyway
good length on middle stump, sharp spin inwards and almost goes down the leg side. Simmons tried to flick towards the leg side, but the ball hits his pads
good length just outside off, goes deep into the crease and punched off the back foot past cover point

appeal for stumping! Did his back leg slide out. Good length on off stump, and misses his drive because of the extra bounce. Quick work from the keeper. Looks like it's on the line. Should be interesting.
full on middle stump, mistimes his drive down the ground and it's intercepted by Yasir. Direct hit at the non-striker's but Simmons is in.
cuts him in half! Full on middle stump, comes slightly inwards and the ball goes between bat and pad, as he tries to drive. Just past the outside of off stump
finds the gap on the off side! Full on off, and enough room to free his arms. Driven with the bat's open face, and breaches the gap between point and cover point
good length on middle stump, turns inwards and hits his pads
full and wide outside off, driven off the back foot past cover. Good use of his wrists to play square
good length outside off and turns inwards. Simmons misses the slog, and the ball's into the keeper's gloves. Is he stumped? That was close, but Simmons back leg was just inside the line
good length on off stump, turned towards the leg side
good length outside off, opens his bat's face and runs it down past short third man. Beats the infield!
full on off stump, big stride forward and driven to mid off. Stopped by Yasir
full on off stump, angles across him, and tapped towards cover point. Played with soft hands
full outside leg, it's the slower ball to start off. Simmons gives it a big wind up, but adjusts his shot to the pace. Pushed awkwardly to mid off
full on leg stump, stays on the back foot, and defended to mid on
full on middle stump, walks across to the off side, and flicked past square leg! Elegant looking this time, and played nice and fine
full on off stump, drives well, but straight to cover. Babar rues missing out
makes up this time! It's full outside off, and the drive goes through the gap. Races into the extra-cover boundary
full outside off, and the batsman is deceived completely. Misses the drive as the ball goes past his outside edge, but so does the keeper. The turn's too much for either of them
full on off stump, driven to mid on off the front foot. Not hit well enough, and allows them to take the run
full on middle stump, prods forward and turns it off his pads to the leg side. Comfortably gets off strike

full outside off, stays on the back foot and cuts this fine. Beats short third man but he's giving it a chase. Almost wins it, but his acrobatic somersault from Agha can't parry the ball back. Gets an applause from Yasir for the effort
over long on! Full on leg stump, but Simmons dances down the wicket, gets his front foot out of the way, and smacks it into the second tier
good length wide outside off, quick to get to the back foot and cut fine. Past backward point's left, and races away for a boundary
full on middle and leg, a quick shuffle towards the off side and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket
short on middle stump, forces Simmons to tiptoe. Glanced off the back foot to backward point. They walk across for the run
good length on off stump, angling across the batsman, and chopped down to third man. He's happy to give the strike back to Simmons
back of a length on middle stump, Simmons is quick to swivel, and it's pulled along the carpet to deep midwicket. The man's there, but the ball's always going away from him
back of a length on leg stump, nudged off the back foot to midwicket

goes between the keeper and first slip! It's the offcutter, and Babar's deceived. Sticks his bat out, and it's edged. Falls short of the two men behind the stumps, but bounces through both their dives. Babar acknowledges the ball's difficulty with a grin
full just outside off, sees the ball through, and defended towards point with the bat's open face
good length on off stump, spins inwards and flicked off his pads to square leg. They walk across for the run and that's his fifty!
full on off stump, drives down the ground, but comes off the bat's inside half. Through to wide long on
pitched full on leg stump, walks in front and tucked off his toes to deep midwicket
full on middle and off, nudges it with the spin to deep midwicket. Babar wants the second, but Simmons wants to stay on strike

full on middle stump, and spins inwards. Simmons is trapped on the crease, and hits his pads. The keeper is quick to dive forward and collect the ball. Looks for the run-out, but Simmons' back leg is well in
full on middle stump, driven to mid on comfortably, but it's a direct hit at the non-striker's! Babar's safe
good length on middle and leg, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle and leg, defended off the back foot, and sent back to the bowler
full on leg stump, tries to flick towards the leg side, but takes the leading edge to cover. Slower ball, too
short on off stump, and that takes an extra bounce! Simmons lines up for the big slash over third man, but can't connect. Looks like he went too hard at that shot
slower bouncer! Simmons misses out once again. Short on middle stump. Simmons comes down the wicket, but can't connect with his pull. The ball goes under his bat
full on off stump, big stride forward and driven. To mid off, though
full on middle stump, shuffles towards the right and smothers it with the spin to square leg
good length outside off, spins into him, and punched towards cover point. They scamper across for the run
full just outside off, spins into Babar, and he nudges it with soft hands towards the leg side
full and wide outside off, big stride forward and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
full outside off, spins away from Simmons this time, and driven square off the front foot. To the square-fielder in the deep
short outside off, angles into Simmons, and he flat-bats it towards cow corner from over his head
back of a length on off stump, pulls down the ground to long on. Bunts it, really

holes out to McClenaghan! A brilliant diving catch at long on sends Simmons back. Full on leg stump, and Simmons tries to thump this over Sohail's head. But it's the slower ball, and Simmons simply bottom edges it
starts off with a dot. It's full and wide outside off, and tapped with soft hands to sweeper cover
yorker on middle, but manages to get his bat down, and squeeze this to deep backward square
just short of full on off stump, comfortably flicked to deep midwicket. He'll keep strike
good length on middle stump, legspin. Babar goes deep into the crease and drags his pull to cow corner
full just outside off stump, smacks this down the ground to long on
good length on off stump, Babar comes down the wicket and mistimes his drive. Bat-padded to Yasir
full on off stump, big heave towards the leg side, but doesn't have the distance. In fact, that saves Babar. Drops between wide long on and deep midwicket. Fakhar didn't charge in quick enough
good length on off stump, turning away from Ingram, and he carves it off the back foot to deep backward point
too full for the pull. Pitches on off stump, but he bunts this towards the leg side. Bottom edges the pull shot to the deep
good length just outside leg, but angling into the batsman. Flicked off his waist to cow corner. They walk across for the run
yorker on middle and leg, manages to squeeze it down to the leg side. Deep backward square cleaning up this time

good length on off stump, stands tall and punches inside out to Fakhar at mid off. Misfielded though! Quite a powerful shot, to be fair, but the ball pops out of the fielder's hands. Adds to McClenaghan's frustrations

dropped by Sohail in the deep! Can't collect it on the rebound. Short on off and Ingram pulls this to deep backward square, Sohail's far too inside the rope, and hits his hand, but the ball falls behind him thereafter. How costly will that be?
good length on off stump, slower this time, and his off-side heave over cover doesn't connect. Goes through to the keeper
good length on middle and leg, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
back of a length just outside off, carved off the back foot to deep extra cover
good length on off stump, turns away from the left-hander, pokes at it towards cover
good length on off, and grips away from Ingram. Tries to punch it away, but misses. Through to the keeper
short on off stump, enough time this time to carve off the back foot to deep backward point
full on middle stump, he's trapped on his crease, but manages to get bat to ball. Nudged towards the leg side
good length on leg stump, spins into Ingram on this occasion, and flicked towards deep square leg
low full toss on middle stump to start off, muscles his drive down the ground, but only to mid off
full on off stump, and it's shoveled! Smacked past the umpire's length, and races away to the long-on boundary. Uses the bottom hand so well, this fella
full on off and middle again, but Ingram can't get the same connection. Mistimes his drive to mid on, who races to his right and intercepts
good length on off stump, always angling across Babar, so he gives it a wild slash. Wants to hit it over cover, but it comes off the bat's bottom end. Goes fine to the third-man boundary

Mid off dives over the ball! McCullum the guilty man here. Has he hurt his shoulder? It was full on off stump, but Babar muscles this down the ground. Hit well, and Baz got to the ball, but couldn't pull the execution off
good length on off stump, angling into the batsman, and pulled to deep backward square
slower ball, short on middle stump. Smothers this to square leg, but the diving effort stops the ball. Can't stop the single, though. Fifty for Babar!

well deceived! The slower ball from Sohail does the trick once again. Back of the hand, and full on off stump. Tries to slog it towards cow corner, but it's sliced. Up in the air, and taken by the keeper. Big wicket in the end overs
short and wide outside off, opens the bat's face and slices this over point! Controlled shot, and sent over the boundary!
short outside off, and it's the slower bouncer this time. Drags his pull from over his head to cow corner
full on off stump, tails into the batsman. Tapped to cover for a quick single
full on leg stump, slower ball once again. Driven with the bat's closed face to wide long on. Fakhar the man there
full just outside off stump, tries to drive down the ground, but misses. Past the bat's outside edge
yorker on leg stump, but angling down the leg side. Goes through to the keeper, and Bopara is bemused that it's not called a wide. Was there a touch off his boot? Bopara doesn't seem to think so
short on off stump, charges down the wicket and tries to slash at it. Mistimed towards deep point
good length on middle stump, pulled with the ball angling into him. Hit over the square-leg umpire to Mitch in the deep
full on leg stump, through his flick too soon. Off the bat's top half, and trickles down to deep backward square
yorker on leg stump. Babar can't get bat to ball, but the ball was angling down always. Hits his pad and the ball dribbles away to square leg
starts off with a yorker. On leg stump, and bottom edged down to fine leg
knee-high full toss on off stump, enough room for Bopara to thump this over the leg side. Got his front foot out of the way, and slogs it to cow corner
good length outside off, too close to Bopara for the back-foot punch but the luck's with him! Takes the outside edge, and past the keeper's right. Races away!
good length on off stump, tries to cut off the back foot, but he''s deceived by the slower ball. Bottom edges it to the keeper
good length on off stump, drags his pull to deep backward square on this occasion
holes out to long off! Another slower-ball wicket to Sohail's kitty. Tries to slog it down the ground, but the bat turns in his hand. Perishes for 61
full outside leg stump, but it's too quick for Bopara to get his feet out of the way. Hits his pad, and trickles down to the leg side

boom boom! First-ball six from Afridi! Oh man, and that's been smacked over long on. Slower ball on off stump, and it's been muscled. Picked the slower ball early and dispatched. The spectators are delighted!

out second ball! Six and out, and that's an excellent second ball. Full on middle, and the batsman misses the slog. The middle stump is on the ground and Shaheen - presumably out of respect - pulls out of his celebration. Guess the bowler won the Afridi battle?
full on off stump, Imad backs away to the leg side and slaps it to cover. Managed to make the room, but just couldn't find the gap
expensive! Good length on leg stump, but wayward. Goes down the leg side with Bopara trying to flick it fine. The keeper's dive to the left ain't good enough either. He's got to bowl that one again
full on off stump, stands tall and bunts it down to long on. Only a single

tries the reverse paddle, but Imad can't connect. Full ball on middle, and the ball hits his boot and through to the off side. McCullum wants to review - probably just because they can. Can Shaheen get another wicket? It hits the pad low in front of leg stump, but looks like it'll miss the leg side. Yes, it does. Karachi finish on 163 for 5
good length wide outside off, and it's the one that angles just a bit away. Fakhar lets it go through after offering his bat for a moment
full on off stump, tapped off the front foot to mid on for a quick single
full on off stump, angling into his pads, and smothered past square leg. Races away, such beautiful timing
short and wide outside off, tries to cut, but no timing behind that. Bottom edged towards point
slower-ball yorker on off stump. Manages to nudge it towards deep midwicket
good length on off stump, angling into Fakhar, and defended off the back foot
good length outside off, it's the slider that jags into the left hander. Goes deep onto the back foot, and punched past the bowler's right
full toss on middle stump, thumped towards midwicket, but the man's positioned there
short on off stump, stands tall and pulls off the back foot. Hit quite straight, in fact. Goes past mid on's left
full outside off, too wide, and it's been slashed past Simmons at point. The diving effort was just not good enough. Can't give Devcich any width
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep backward square. Helps the quick ball on its way
good length on middle stump, jags into Fakhar, and he tries the pull shot. Misses out, however. Bottom edged onto his pads

hits him where it hurts the most! Devcich is down on his knees. Good length outside off, and the extra bounce brings the delivery ball. He misses the leg-side slog. Here's hoping that abdomen guard is high quality. We need a breather

quick from Amir! Good length on middle stump, tucked towards the leg side or a quick run. Amir was swift to run down the wicket and lob the ball onto the stumps at the striker's end. Fakhar's dive saves him
full on off stump, flicked off his pads towards midwicket for a walking single

full on leg stump, backs away towards the leg side and smacks it past Amir! He puts his hand out to the right, and gets fingertips to it. Ooo, it's bleeding! Full marks for commitment, but blood is never nice. Hit so hard, that mid off had no chance either. Lucky for Karachi, that's his right hand
ramped over the keeper! Back of a length ball and angling into Devcich. Backs away to the off side, and lifts if over the keeper's head. Excellent
good length on middle, tucked to square leg off the back foot, and finally, that's the end of the over
another first-ball wicket! Full outside leg stump, Devcich misses the leg-side flick but the ball hits his pad and ricochets onto middle stump. Goes after a breezy 24
good length on off stump, angling into the right hander, extra bounce this time, and hits his guts. The ball trickles towards the off side
full outside off, and it's the textbook cover drive. Full extension of the arms and sent to the extra-cover boundary
good length outside off, stands tall and cuts to point. Well hit, but no direction in that
good length on middle stump, but angling down the leg side. Comfortably glanced off his pads past short fine leg. No stopping that! Just a bit awry, that line
back of a length wide outside off, angling into Salman and carved to deep backward point

good length on middle stump, chops it down to third man and they're off for the second run. Irfan, from third man, runs to his left and does an excellent pick-up-and-throw to the keeper. But the keeper misses the run out! Threw it at the stumps from a couple of feet away, but misses. Fakhar's hurt his knee, and Irfan may also have hurt his finger
good length on off stump, angles into the batsman's body. Punched off the back foot square on the off side
back of a length on middle stump, it's the slower-ball bouncer, that Fakhar flat bats over mid off. Chipped over Afridi, and chase for the man
good length on off stump, turned off his hips to deep backward square
good length wide outside off, sticks his bat out and pokes it to backward point
good length on off stump, stands tall and taps it towards the leg side. The bowler runs to his right and intercepts
shoveled over cow corner! Full on leg stump, and muscled over the leg side. Just got his front foot out of the ball's line, and smacked it just beyond the boundary
chance of a run out, but the throw at the non-striker's end is wayward! Tapped to the leg side but Salman is halfway down the wicket. Irfan collects, and throws. But not accurate enough
good length on middle stump, chopped to point and once again a hesitation! Terrific throw from point, but just over the top of off stump. Agha the dangerman both times
full on middle stump, it's the slower ball, and carved over point! Waited for the ball to get to him before lifting it with the bat's open face
full on middle and off, backs away and drives to cover. Man there
full on off stump, slides across Fakhar and through to the keeper. Tries to poke at it, but can't make the connection
full outside off, and zips straight across. Shoulders his arms this time. A rarity in T20s
full on middle and off, big stride forward and defended back to Afridi
good length on middle stump, turns into Fakhar. Nudged off his hips to deep midwicket
good length on off stump, and angling into the batsman. Flicked off his hips to midwicket
full on off and middle, full stride forward and pushed to wide mid on
full on off stump, comes forward and tapped to midwicket for a walking single
good length on middle stump, angles into the left-hander, clipped off his pads to deep backward square
good length on off stump, tries to work it towards square leg, but takes the leading edge. Trickles down to point
full and wide outside off, runs down the wicket and slapped to long off for a run
good length outside off, cut off the back foot. This time it's hit next to point, and running away to the boundary
shouts of 'catch it'! But goes past Imad's left. Full outside off, and driven past the bowler
good length on off stump, goes deep onto the back foot and cut to point. Too close to his body to execute that particular shot
full outside off stump, lifted over cover's head, and it drops just inside the boundary. Deep extra cover runs across to his right, and intercepts
good length on off and middle, turned off his pads to square leg
big wind up, and smacked! Full outside off, and that's been slogged over long on! Amir's a mere spectator. Uses the flight and swats that away
full on off stump, down on one knee and slapped to cow corner. Deep midwicket's there, but falls just next to Simmons. He can't pull it back
good length on off stump, cut fine to backward point
full on off stump, big backlift and defended back to Wasim
full on off and middle, goes to the back foot and clips it to midwicket
full on middle and leg, turned off his pads to midwicket with soft hands. Allows them to take the extra run
full on middle stump, big stride forward and turned to wide long on. The fielder in the deep races ahead and throws it in
good length on middle stump, punched down the ground to long on for a walking single. Fakhar'll keep strike
full outside leg stump, misses the flick fine down the leg side. Hits his back pad and trickles down to fine leg
good length on off stump, tails inwards. Muscles it past the non-striker to mid on
good length on middle stump, close to his body for the cut, but goes for that shot anyway. Tapped to point
full and wide outside off, slashes hard at it and top edged to third man in the deep
good length outside leg stump, shuffles down the wicket and flat-bats it to cover
good length on middle and leg, he shuffles down the ground once again but misses the leg-side flick. Hits his thigh pad
good length on off stump, walks down the wicket and punches it back to Imad
full outside off, slashes at it away from his body towards cover
full and wide outside off, slaps it away from his body, but mistimed. Bottom-edged to the bowler
slogged to cow corner, but holes out! Taken by Denly there. He fired it wide outside off, and Fakhar's big slog doesn't have the distance. Comfortably taken
full outside off stump, punched inside out to cover, and that's stopped well by the man there. Quicker ball (100kph) to welcome Narine
good length on middle stump, tries to flick fine, but his shot takes his pad and goes through towards square leg. Chase for the keeper
slower ball full on off stump, driven with the bat's closed face to wide long on
good length on middle stump, nudged off his pads to midwicket, and the bowler gives it a chase. Narine scampers across for the run
full and wide outside off, slapped away from his body to cover. Stopped by Afridi there
full and wide outside off, it's the slower ball, and his drive is inside-edged onto the pads
slower ball full on leg stump, Narine makes room and smacks over midwicket. Man in the deep
full on middle and leg, and goes down the leg side. Salman misses the sweep
full on off stump, backs away and lifts over cover. Rocket throw from deep extra cover, and he's struggling! Agha Salman's dive looks it's saved him. Yes, the third umpire concurs
yorker on middle and leg, shoveled down the ground past Irfan. Looks like it's gonna be a four, but Denly's dive at long on stops that. He's got to bowl that one again, though
perfect ball. Full outside leg stump, and with Narine backing away, the ball goes between his legs and through to the keeper
perfect yorker on middle stump,. Narine gets his bat down and pings it to cover
low full toss on leg stump, full follow through of the bat offered, and smacked to cow corner. Couple of bounces and to the man in the deep

takes his time, but raises his finger! Full on leg stump, and it's a low full toss. Narine can't connect, and hits his front pad on the full. Impact straight in front of leg stump. Narine does well not to take the review. Nice jinx, Mirza
full just outside off stump, big stride forward and defended to Irfan. Bowled from the wide of the crease
full on middle and leg, clipped off his toes to Simmons at third man. He'll keep strike
full on middle stump, prods forward and muscles it down to long off
full on middle and leg, goes down on one knee and slog swept! Top edged, perhaps, but enough behind that shot to take it behind the deep backward-square boundary
good length outside off stump, slapped to the off side, but stopped by Denly at cover point
full on off stump, hangs behind on this occasion, and pushes to wide long off
full just outside off, McCullum gets onto the front foot and opens the bat's face. Taps it to cover point
full outside off stump, drives well square, but Afridi - aged 38 - dives to his right and stops it from going for a four. Excellent effort at cover point
low full toss on middle and leg, clipped off his pads to deep midwicket for a walking single
knee-high full toss on leg stump. Punched down the ground to long on. Could've slogged it to the leg side, but the ball angling in cramped him up just that bit
oh goodness! Free runs. Full and wide outside leg stump, Salman had backed away to the leg side and the bowler tried to follow him. Fails, and the keeper can't get to it either
knee-high full toss again outside leg stump. Irfan's following him everytime Salman backs away. This time it's been bunted to cover for a single

more runs! Leg byes this time. Full on middle, but the angle takes it down the leg side. Hits Baz's front pad, and the keeper gets some glove as well. But, the bowler's pace means that's four more. Mickey Arthur is furious in the dugout
back of a length outside off, flat-bats this slower ball to wide long on. Mistimes his slog
good length wide outside off, but tails into Salman. He tries to carve this towards the off side but the ball goes between bat and pad. Through to the keeper. He stays on 49
short on middle stump, and over Baz's head. He tries to pull, but can't connect. Asks the square-leg umpire for the bouncer, but the umpire says nothing. A dot, the second-best way to start an over
yorker just outside leg stump, Hits his boot. Tried to use his wrists to flick fine, but couldn't get bat to ball
overpitched full and very wide outside off stump. Baz doesn't even bother moving. Gotta bowl that again

back of a length outside leg stump, McCullum tries to pull but misses. The ball definitely went down the leg side, but umpire Aleem Dar says no to the wide. Baz is bemused! I'm taking McCullum's side here
low full toss on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket. That's the first ball he managed to get his bat to the delivery
full on middle and off, caresses this drive to cover for a single. There's his fifty! An excellent knock, but the job is only half done
yorker on off stump. Bottom edges it to mid off for a run
good length on middle stump, angling across BMac, and he smacks it (flat-batted, really) to cover

classic Baz! Six over the keeper's head. We've missed that ramp shot from the man. Full toss on middle stump, and McCullum shuffles to the off side, opens his stance, and scoops it over the keeper. Oh, my, my.
full on leg stump. McCullium tries to turn this towards square leg, but can't connect. Hits his boot and trickles down to short fine leg

short on leg stump. Big wind up, and pulls it off the back foot! Looks like it's going for a six, but nope! Babar Azam at deep midwicket, takes the catch, but scoops it back before going over the rope. Lendl Simmons is nearby, and he holds on to Babar's lob. The umpire wants a second look: the replays suggest that Babar's toe wasn't touching the rope at all. Excellent from him. The replays have been one for atleast three minutes now. What's the decision? Out! Take nothing away from Salman, though. A brilliant innings comes to an end.
full toss on middle and leg, nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Calls for the second run early and completed with ease

clipped to square leg! Usman Khan you beauty. Full on leg stump, and turned to the only infielder on the leg side. Simple catch to Simmons. A double fist-pump from the bowler as BMac makes his way back
full on off stump, opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man. The man there ensures it's only a single

knee-high full toss outside off stump, sliced over mid off, but it's in the air! Imad Wasim runs backward before taking a catch from near his face. Comes down tumbling - on his back - and completes an excellent catch. Hopefully he hasn't hurt his head. Came down with quite a mighty force there. Imad Wasim has been stretchered off.
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to cover point
Ramps it fine! Full outside off, shuffles across to the off side and paddles over the keeper. Fine leg was too square
short on off stump, McClenaghan tries the reverse paddle this time, but can't connect. Awkward bounce for the keeper, and he misses the collection. Allows them to steal the run

full on off stump, tries to flick towards square leg but misses. Hits his back leg, and dribbles away to the leg side. The keeper chases behind it, but McClenaghan could be in trouble! Nope, he's safe. The fielder from midwicket took the bails off, but the big New Zealander was in
good length on middle stump, manages to shovel it to point. The fielder has a shy at the stumps but misses. No one backing up, and Sohail comes back for the second run
smacked over Usman! Stands tall and pitches this full ball's length very early. Big swing, and he misses the yorker. The low full toss comes off the bat's sweet spot
you beauty, Sohail Akhtar! Full on off stump, and he gets his front foot out of the way. Just the perfect length for the long handle, and it's been thumped over long off. Smoked!

short ball on middle stump, tries to pull but misses because of the slower ball. McClenaghan is backing up and he's scampered across to the other side, but the keeper gets the direct hit. They're taking the second run - off the overthrow - but replays show that the batsman was short! Dot ball, and Sohail's off strike. Four off two now
full on off stump, smacked to cover for a single. They need three off the final ball to win. Two for a super over

is that a six?! Nope, that's taken at long on! But wait, he's overstepped! Karachi's celebrations need to wait. It was in the slot to be punished, and Sohail lifts this over the non-striker and taken at long on. Karachi are celebrating, but, but, but, but, Usman has conceded a front-foot no ball! You can't write a script for this! Free hit now, but they're also checking if the batsmen took a single before the catch was taken. If they complete the run then Lahore will need 1 off 1. If he was out before the run was taken, then Lahore need 2 off 1. The umpires are still conferring. OK, its official: no run off the bat there. Lahore need two off one. Plus, a free hit. They can only be run out off the last ball.

super over! Unbelievable scenes. Confusion everywhere. Full toss low on middle stump, mistimed to the leg side and they're off for the run. Usman collects, and runs them out at the striker's end as they try to sneak a second. McCullum and Lahore want clarification. He's talking to the umpire, presumably about the run off the previous delivery. The commentators say that 'McCullum thought that they needed one off the final ball.' There's still a lot of confusion, but sanity prevails eventually. It'll be a super over. Phew.
